#  BOT Rotation
<!--
@name:  BOT Rotation
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Obtains the angle Bot rotates around the specified axis, with the clockwise direction as the positive direction.
## Parameters

- **axis&dollar;**: The axis to return
---
